Method Detail

isDeferred

public boolean isDeferred()
This boolean is true when the writer is in deferred mode.

Returns:
True if in deferred mode

getIsDeferred

public boolean getIsDeferred()
Identical to isDeferred(). Supports scripting engines which don't know how to recognize the "is" getter notation, but can recognize the "get" notation.

Returns:
True if in deferred mode
See Also:
isDeferred()

defer

public boolean defer()
Ask to defer this conversation.

Returns:
True if deferred, false if already in deferred mode
